data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huo, Qing-Bo, Du, Yu-Zhou (2018): Two new species of Cryptoperla (Plecoptera: Peltoperlidae) from China, with description of the nymph of Cryptoperla dui Sivec. Zootaxa 4374 (3): 395-408, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4374.3.4|3 occurrences
